Abstract: Editorial on the legacy that people alive at beginning of the new millennium should leave to succeeding generations
Snippet: Editorial on the legacy that people alive at beginning of the new millennium should leave to succeeding generations
LeadParagraph: So now at last begins the year 2000, a juncture in time so long anticipated it is hard to believe it has arrived, disguised as a mere Saturday. The year is so utterly new, all four digits overturned at once, that simply seeing the date in print jars the eye.

Headline.Main: 2000 and Beyond -- The Shape of an Age to Come
Headline.PrintHeadline: 2000 and Beyond -- The Shape of an Age to Come
